question: Which state/UT has launched a new rural housing scheme named "Maha Awas Yojana"?
explanation:
Maharashtra Chief Minister Uddhav Thackeray has launched a new rural housing project named "Maha Awas Yojana”.
Under the new scheme, as many as 8.82 lakh rural houses will be built in a period of 100 days. The outlay of the project is estimated to be Rs 4000 crore. The state’s Department of Rural Development will undertake this project.
